These are some of my interests

3d Printing

3D Printing

3D printing, or additive manufacturing, is the construction of a three-dimensional object from a CAD model or a digital 3D model.

  • 3d printing allows you to make objects out of various materials
  • Objects can be easily designed with various 3d design software
  • There are convenient online repositories of objects that allow users to print objects that others have designed

3d Printing Materials

Material Strength Cost
ABS ++ -
PLA + -
PETG ++ +
Carbon Fiber Filled +++ +++

Rehabbing Houses

Rehabbing Houses

Rehabbing is a popular real estate exit strategy that involves renovating a property and selling it for a profit.

  • Rehabbing houses is a great hobby that allows you to learn skills while potentially making a profit
  • Rehabbing also allows you to buy houses in areas that may otherwise be outside of your price range
  • At the end of a rehab, you may choose to sell, rent out, or live in the house

Rehabbing is a popular real estate exit strategy that involves renovating a property and selling it for a profit.
